feed.title: Akanksha Singh
feed.subtitle: I am a researcher dedicated to leveraging machine learning to propose data-driven solutions to real-world challenges. My work focuses on deep learning for vision and speech modalities. Currently, I am a Post-Baccalaureate Fellow at CeRAI, IIT Madras under the supervision of Prof. B. Ravindran. Previously, I worked at IAB Lab, IIT Jodhpur under Prof. Richa Singh and Prof. Mayank Vatsa for my external Master's Thesis. Outside research, I am an avid quizzer and committed sportsperson.
